tool_description: Get fast information about videos, playlists, channels, download links and more!
name: FastTube
title: FastTube

api_list.name: Get search
Get channel information
Get download links
api_list.description: Get direct download links in audio/video format, with every information required.

api_list.name: Get autocompletion
api_list.description: Provides autocompletion of a query in the JSON format.

api_list.name: Get playlist links
api_list.description: Provides links of the videos inside a playlist in the JSON format.

api_list.name: Get playlist information
api_list.description: Provides information about a playlist in the JSON format.

api_list.name: Get video description
api_list.description: Provides the description of a video in the JSON format.

api_list.name: Get video info
api_list.description: Provides information about a video in the JSON format
